Desc.entry: Supports young people in independent living skills. Offers sessions covering a range of subjects, including personal development, confidence building and practical skills such as cooking and budgeting. Self or any referral. Company limited by guarantee no 3846994.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon & Tues 9am-5pm (session times for young people), please contact for details

category.entry: HOUSING, ADVICE AND SUPPORT FOR HOMELESS OR VULNERABLE PEOPLE
